resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106856</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106856</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206264</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Drinking Water; Kids' Stuff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trinkwasser; Material Der Zicklein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Eau Potable ; La Substance des Gosses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água Bebendo; Material Dos Miúdos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua potabile; Roba dei capretti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόσιμο νερό  Ουσία κατσικιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua Potable; Materia De los Cabritos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">teaches kids about the importance of safe drinking water through teaching and learning resources such as an activity on how to build your own aquifer, experiments on the water treatment process, and the drinking water art project.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtet Zicklein über den Wert des sicheren 
Trinkwassers durch die unterrichtenden und erlernenbetriebsmittel wie 
eine Aktivität auf, wie man Ihren eigenen Aquifer, Experimente auf 
dem Wasserbehandlungprozeß und das Trinkwasserkunstprojekt aufbaut.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseigne des gosses au sujet de l'importance de 
l'eau potable sûre par les ressources d'enseignement et d'étude 
telles qu'une activité sur la façon dont établir votre propre 
couche aquifère, expériences sur le processus de traitement à 
l'eau, et le projet d'art d'eau potable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensina miúdos sobre a importância da água 
bebendo segura através dos recursos ensinando e de aprendizagem tais 
como uma atividade em como construir seu próprio aquifer, 
experiências no processo do tratamento de água, e o projeto da arte 
da água bebendo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegna i capretti circa l'importanza di acqua 
potabile sicuro attraverso le risorse d'istruzione ed imparanti quale 
un'attività su come sviluppare il vostro proprio strato acquifero, 
gli esperimenti sul processo di trattamento delle acque ed il progetto
di arte dell'acqua potabile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διδάσκει τα κατσίκια για τη σημασία του ασφαλούς 
πόσιμου νερού μέσω της διδασκαλίας και τα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς 
εκμάθησης όπως μια δραστηριότητα στο πώς να χτίσουν το υδροφόρο 
στρώμα σας, πειραματίζονται στη διαδικασία κατεργασίας ύδατος, 
και το πρόγραμμα τέχνης πόσιμου νερού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enseña a cabritos sobre la importancia del agua 
potable segura a través de recursos de enseñanza y que aprenden 
tales como una actividad en cómo construir su propio acuífero, 
experimentos en el proceso del tratamiento de aguas, y el proyecto del
arte del agua potable.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206264</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106856</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/drinking-water-kids-stuff</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
